name: Chosen Angels
description:
The angels, who have finished their work on earth, must urgently return to heaven. This is where an angel named Constantine comes to their aid. He has to direct them all to the entrance to heaven in time. There are 4 entrances, and each one is for a different angel. Help him direct all the angels to their true path!

Chosen Angels is a side scroller game where you have to play as an angel, who must cope with not an easy job. Need to have time to deliver all the angels on the right path. The color of their wings corresponds to their color of the door. Do not hesitate, with time there will be a lot of them. You are sure to make it!

Game Features:
- Beautiful Pixel-Art.
- Increasing Difficulty
- Music
